name: Cotton Spore
description: You unleash spores of thick cotton that covers the target. Force a target in range to make a CON save against your Move DC. On a fail, the targetâ€™s speed is reduced by 10 for the duration. If this reduction in speed causes their speed to be 0, they are restrained for the duration.

contest.effect: Badly startles Pokemon that the audience has high expectations of.
